name: ColorCrack
description:
Match the bottom color with the top color as closely and as quickly as you can!

// CONTROLS: > Hold LMB to control the bottom color > x-axis controls hue > x-axis controls saturation while holding Shift or RMB > y-axis controls value > Mouse wheel controls rate of change > Release LMB to submit color > Use numbers 1-4 to select a sound pack
